name: flow bemail service
short_description: an email service that will allow senders to send emails to a list of recipients in some sequence or loop.at the client side the sender will enter details like who the recipient are,in what order the mail is to move from recipient to another ,how much time the email will transit each recipient.the server is then responsible to circulate the mail among the recipients and allow them to add their comments and endorsements.if a recipient does not answer an email and the transit time is over the server sends the email to the next recipient in the route.the server also keeps a log of all modifications made to an email.there should a user friendly interface.
